thread.title: Pass-A-Grille Beach is TBBJ's 2015 Best Beach
thread.title_full: Pass-A-Grille Beach is TBBJ's 2015 Best Beach

author: Jo-Lynn Brown
title: Pass-A-Grille Beach is TBBJ's 2015 Best Beach
text:
Enlarge After more than 1,000 votes in five rounds of voting, TBBJ readers have determined the best beach in Tampa Bay. Pass-a-Grille Beach on St. Pete Beach was named the best beach in the area, with 70 percent of the vote in the final round. In comparison, Siesta Beach in Siesta Key was the runner up with 30 percent of the vote. Fort Desoto Park and Holmes Beach on Anna Maria Island also made it into the final four of the bracket. Thanks for voting and shoot me an email at jbrown@bizjournals.com if you have ideas for a bracket, poll or survey. Head over to our Business Pulse page to take quizzes, surveys and polls. 
Want Tampa Bay Travel   Business Pulse
